sec.p: Cinnamon volatile (essential) oil was extracted from cinnamon wood in our laboratory and administered intraperitoneally (0.5, 1, and 2 mg/kg) in acute treatment. Cinnamon was administered same as the previous protocol in the sub-acute administration for 14 days. Cinnamon was solved in normal saline + Tween 80 (1%). The solution was freshly prepared before administration. Fluoxetine (Dr. Abidi Pharm Co, Iran) and desipramine (Pars Daru Co, Iran) were used as positive control drugs in depressive behaviors. Diazepam (Darupakhsh Co. Iran) was used as a positive control drug in the elevated plus maze test. Dosage selection was based on previous studies ( 22, 23).
